a1: There are more popular teams but yes they are.

a2: What are the other popular teams?

a3: Yes, I totally agree that those two are the most popular teams in Spain but also the athletic Madrid is also one of the most popular

a4: Atletico Madrid flag is what color ?

a5: Yes. The flag is red, white, and blue with a bear on an incline and stars around the top half of the border.
